person.persName: William Grose (Henry County, IIndiana, attorney, judge, and colonel, 36th IN Vol Inf, Brig gen'l Army of Cumb (USA))

body.p: Henry County, Indiana, attorney, judge, and soldier. Dayton, Ohio, native. Married to Rebecca Grose. Father of Madison Grose, Sarah Grose, Elvira Grose, John Grose, Adolphus Grose, and James Grose. Studied law in New Castle, Indiana. Attorney in New Castle. Unsuccessful Democratic candidate for Congress in 1852. Delegate to the Republican National Convention in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, in 1856. Elected judge of local common pleas court in New Castle in 1860. Commissioned colonel of the 36th Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment in October 1861. Commanded a brigade and later a division in the Army of the Cumberland from 1862 to 1865. Commissioned brigadier general on July 30, 1864.
